All-in-one Property Management Solution

A comprehensive solution for
all your property management needs,

Automatic Lease Management

Approve a new applicant, create a lease contract, & check-in your resident in 5 minutes!

With Yarn's Unified Contract, you can now have all your tenants contracts in one single database that is secure and easily retrieved & tracked. Get automatic notifications upon lease expiry, auto-generate invoices with full accounting entries posted! Save hundreds of hours, effort & money!

Compatible with Ejar

Why double the effort when you can just create one contract?
We're here to help you work smart, not hard!

Our unified contract module will allow you to create your lease contract, post it directly to EJAR's platform with a click of a button with our intelligent API's.

  • Upload unit Photos and Inventory.

  • Full Property & Unit info documentation.

Branded Tenant Mobile Application IOS & Android

Be ahead of your competition. Let your tenants do the marketing for you!

Provide a top notch experience to your tenants with our tenant mobile App! You can now reach your tenants easily, keep them informed, collect payments & manage all their requests while keeping them happy!

Brand it, customize it, make it your own!

You can add your branding to our Yarn Tenant app create & make it your own in the Google Play & App Store, which is one of our customization and design options that will create a unique experience for your community and brand. Contact us for pricing and details.

إدارة علاقات العملاء في الوقت الفعلي

Modern interface

Easily navigate through our dashboard and control everything from the tip of your finger.

Accessible

Anywhere, anytime, you just need an internet connection, and you can monitor all your properties and assets with a 360-degree perspective.

Full history logs

Monitor your team and have access to the entire activity on your dashboard and system.

Pipeline Management

Categorize and organize your property with multi-unit types and full management information including (unit prices, payment cycles, photos, inventory, and unit documentation.

No need to change your current system

Our solution will work alongside your existing system rather than replacing them, and our team will work alongside your team to provide the needed expertise and training.

Yarn solution for Maintenance Management

  • Monitor cost per task (Man-hour & spare part)
  • Corrective & Preventive Maintenance
  • Warranty Tracing
  • Assign Tasksto staff, team & 3rd party
  • Upload images/Videos
  • Auto Scheduling & Follow up
  • Tasks per location & Department
  • Create Maintenance Teams
  • Powerful Filtering & Grouping
  • 3D Reporting
  • Smart Maintenance & dynamic Calendar
  • Select assets, unit, property, equipment
  • Define inspection frequency & period
  • Full notifications cycle and SLA

Manage maintenance tasks and monitor costs with ease

The dashboard provides clear and concise data that enables you to make informed decisions about your maintenance tasks. You can easily assign tasks, schedule auto-follow ups, and create maintenance teams.

Preventive Maintenance

Preventive maintenance is a critical component of any facility management, our smart dynamic dashboard makes it easy to schedule preventive maintenance tasks and keep track of your assets. With our system, you can select the assets you want to maintain, assign them to staff & You'll receive full notifications throughout the maintenance cycle.

الوقت الفعلي Security & Access Management System

Yarn is the smart choice for protecting your property.

In today's world, security is more important than ever. That's why our Smart Features offers a top-of-the-line security and access management system via Yarn technology solutions.

Authorize & Organize Visitors access
Generate Unique Pass Code
Document all the Visitor Access details
Track Visitors entrance Log in /out
Track vehicle date/owners
Track vendor delivery & staff access

تطبيق هاتف وبوابة إلكترونية Customized Tenant Mobile App & Web Portal

Using our free mobile app, your tenants will have all your services at their fingertips. From requesting maintenance to booking a therapy at the spa, or ordering a pizza in-house delivery, to viewing bills and payments.

Our enterprise clients may even have their own branded mobile apps available on the app stores.
